ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can cola soft drink

cookingTips: Cook bacon until crispy for maximum flavor contrast with the sweet beans
Drain the canned beans to prevent the dish from becoming too watery
The cola adds caramel notes that complement the bacon and brown sugar
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how cola replaces traditional tomato-based sauce and adds depth to baked beans.
